game_description: Play with boxes and see how tall you can stack them! Shoot down all those zomb- I mean, targets as fast as possible! Try to get a strike or spare while bowling! Use the recoil to fly and cause mass destruction! Find all the bugs and get points! Try all this and more in the game!
Developer: URAV ADVANCED LEARNING SYSTEMS PVT LTD
Publisher: URAV ADVANCED LEARNING SYSTEMS PVT LTD
